item.description: I've always wanted to see "Wicked" and it's coming to the Boston Opera House this fall. Please note, this showtime is now sold out, but you can try checking back, sometimes tickets become available closer to the date, I have closed this to new RSVPs but if you get a last minute ticket, just email me. There wasn't a way to get this time and day with a group rate, so we all have to buy tickets in advance separately. Unfortunately we won't be able to sit together, but I will get there at 1:30 pm if you want to connect before the show, and if people are interested in dinner somewhere afterwards, let me know (maybe Jacob Wirth's? I'm open to suggestions) and I'll post it as a separate event if I can figure out what time the show is over. http://www.wickedthem...
item.name: "Wicked" at the Boston Opera House
